RelatedSentence: A federal judge struck down Oregon 's gay marriage ban on Monday and Multnomah County clerks immediately began issuing marriage licenses .
U.S. District Judge Michael McShane ruled that the ban was unconstitutional and discriminatory and it did n't seem to have any rationally related government purpose , reports the Los Angeles Times .
